main event: A sighting of one small, bright light object was observed moving westward around 7:40 p.m.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 5 minutes before it moved away at high speed, changing direction and disappearing., The distance of the object was estimated to be approximately 3 miles., The object showed characteristics that could indicate it was a satellite, meteor, or aircraft light., During the sighting, the object appeared to be stationary for about five minutes above the treetops., An observer reported seeing a jet in the area at the time of the sighting.
witness description: The observer reported the sighting visually.
